ygData.subject: Re: Dual, Wield, at, Level, 13!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Shouldn t have told me this ... now I m going to have to get sick at work all of a sudden and go home.  ;-) -Faderic
ygData.messageBody:
Shouldn't have told me this ... now I'm going to have to get sick at work all of
a sudden and go home. ;-)

-Faderic


Patricia Halas wrote:

> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> Something changed on the last patch.
>
> Had another warrior stop me to tell me that dual wield is now trainable at
> level 13!! Woohoo ï¿½ went to the trainer in Freeport and now I am dealing
> death with my combine lsword in one hand and a FS lsword in the other. This
> is a great skill!!!! I was farting around trying to increase my skill by
> using a rusty 2h sword. This is so much better!! Can't wait until I make
> level 15 and get double strike.
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
